mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_camping_api ( ca_idx, ca_name, ca_intro, ca_manage_status, ca_induty, ca_sido, ca_sigungu, ca_postcode, ca_addr_default, ca_addr_detail, ca_mapX, ca_mapY, ca_tel, ca_oper_period, ca_oper_date, ca_fire_cnt, ca_sub_facility, ca_possibilty, ca_environment, ca_theme, ca_tool, ca_pet, ca_img )VALUES( #{ca_idx}, #{ca_name}, #{ca_intro}, #{ca_manage_status}, #{ca_induty}, #{ca_sido}, #{ca_sigungu}, #{ca_postcode}, #{ca_addr_default}, #{ca_addr_detail}, #{ca_mapX}, #{ca_mapY}, #{ca_tel}, #{ca_oper_period}, #{ca_oper_date}, #{ca_fire_cnt}, #{ca_sub_facility}, #{ca_possibilty}, #{ca_environment}, #{ca_theme}, #{ca_tool}, #{ca_pet}, #{ca_img} )
